item.title: eumanzor add a quote by Knut Hamsun
item.description: "A few days back someone sent me two feathers. Two bird's feathers in a sheet of note-paper with a coronet, and fastened with a seal. Sent from a place a long way off; from one who need not have sent them back at all. That amused me too, those devilish green feathers." -- Knut Hamsun

item.title: eumanzor add a quote by George Smoot
item.description: "...But every day I go to work I'm making a bet that the universe is simple, symmetric, and aesthetically pleasing... " -- George Smoot

item.title: eumanzor add a quote by Tom Chiarella
item.description: "...since it's about drifting, forgetting, passing time without noticing. Instead, quietly pay attention..." -- Tom Chiarella

item.title: eumanzor add a quote by Jorge Luis Borges
item.description: "Me dijo que su libro se llamaba el Libro de Arena, porque ni el libro ni la arena tienen ni principio ni fin" -- Jorge Luis Borges

item.title: eumanzor add a quote by Imre Kertesz
item.description: "...I would like to live a little bit longer in this beautiful concentration camp." -- Imre Kertesz

item.title: eumanzor add a quote by Milan Kundera
item.description: "don't be scared, don't be scared, you won't feel any pain there, you'll dream of squirrels abd rabbits, you'll have cows there, and Mefisto will be there, don't be scared"..." -- Milan Kundera
